cells.data:
* attribute type:
	* nominal: brown/green
	* ordinal (ordered): a, b, d, e…/1,2,3,4,5…
	* interval: 13 Jan, 26 Jan
	* ratio: $266, $278
* attribute:
	* discrete
	* continuous: real numbers (floating points)
* data set type:
	* record data: rows+columns+withText
	* transaction/market basket data: each row contains a set of data
	* data matrix: rows+columns+only number
	* sparse data matrix: lots of zeros
